backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining installations and proposals with queries for lookup and mutations for submitting and updating proposal status with strict status transition rules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI features, related files, components, and test identifiers for proposals listing, details, and status updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including docs, hooks, and UI components.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: High-level architecture document outlining Whisper’s vision, installation hierarchy, canister topology, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide covering dfx configuration, canister deployment steps, upgrade patterns, and cycle management.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Phased roadmap describing deliverables, non-goals, and success criteria from initial architecture through multi-installation expansion.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Visual style guide defining design principles, color system, typography, and UI behavior for Whisper’s civic aesthetic.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout rendering header, proposals section, and create‑instance CTA with state toggles.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating instance proposals with validation, debounced name checks, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing full proposal details with status update actions and loading/error states.
Lists all instance proposals with loading/error states and opens detail dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Hooks for checking instance-name availability and submitting proposals with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Utility hook that returns a debounced version of any value for delayed reactions like API calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider wrapping Dfinity AuthClient to load, manage, and clear Internet Identity along with login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend calls to check parent-child relationships and fetch proposals or a single proposal.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: React Query mutation for updating a proposal’s status and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind and custom CSS variables defining theme colors, typography, and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, fonts, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture goals, design principles, and tracked features for the Whisper ICP platform.
